visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include monthly rainfall data. Custom colors should be applied to the series, and additional configurations should include chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and it includes custom background colors and margins for better visual appeal. The x-axis displays month categories with styled labels, while the y-axis shows rainfall values with a title and styled labels. The data series includes monthly rainfall data with a custom color applied. The legend is enabled and styled to match the overall theme. Additional configurations include navigation menu styling for better user interaction.
